title: The secret behind these autonomous delivery robots
description: Serve Robotics operates a state-of-the-art, AI-powered, autonomous fleet of delivery robots in Los Angeles. And they have big plans to expand. But this autonomous revolution is still very much powered by humans. Heres a rare look behind the scenes.
